name: Cannabis Hyperemesis Syndrome
chief_complaint: I've been vomiting non-stop and hot showers are the only thing that helps
prognosis: Symptoms resolve with cannabis abstinence but may recur with reuse
description: A paradoxical condition in chronic cannabis users characterized by cyclic vomiting episodes relieved by hot bathing. Pathophysiology involves CB1 receptor dysregulation in the hypothalamus and gastrointestinal tract.
